name: Hod Putt
description: Bill Piersol; Killed someone near Procters Grove.

name: Ollie McGee
description: Has a husband Fletcher McGee who secretly destroyed her.

name: Fletcher McGee
description: Destroyed by Ollie McGee's wife.

name: Robert Fulton Tanner
description: Bitten by rat.

name: Cassius Hueffer
description: No information available.

name: Serepta Hueffer
description: No information available.

name: Amanda Barker
description: Husband Henry unknown.

name: Constance Harley
description: Mothered sister's children Irene & Mary.

name: Chase Henry
description: Drunkard denied burial by priest unknown; Buried close to banker Nicholas and wife Priscilla.

name: Harry Carey Goodhue
description: Chase Henry's spiritual brother; Fought against everything.

name: Judge Somers
description: Praised by Justice Breese; Chase Henry has marble grave but he has none.

name: Kinsey Keene
description: Addresses Thomas Rhodes (bank), Coolbaugh Whedon (newspaper), Rev. Peet (church), A.D. Blood (mayor).

name: Benjamin Pantier
description: Rejected by Mrs. Benjamin Pantier wife; Brother of Reuben.

name: Mrs. Benjamin Pantier
description: Mother of Reuben Pantier; Drove away Benjamin Pantier.

name: Reuben Pantier
description: Spark fire of life started and influenced by Emily Sparks.

name: Emily Sparks
description: Did before she knew if she had inspired Reuben Pantier but she left.

name: Trainor the Druggist
description: Described Ben, Mrs. Pantier, and Reuben.

name: Daisy Fraser
description: Called out Editor Don, Circuit Judge, Rev. Peet, and Sibley; Brought before Justice Arnett.

name: Benjamin Fraser
description: Son of Benjamin Pantier and Daisy Fraser.

name: Minerva Jones
description: Raped by "Butch" Weldy; Doe Myers tried to save her but failed.

name: Indignation" Jones
description: Father of Minerva Jones.

name: Doe Myers (Dr. David Talbott)
description: *thinks that Doe Hill did more for the people of the town then him*; Tried to save Minerva Jones; Disgraced by newspapers; Mrs. Myers died.

name: Mrs. Meyers
description: Died from broken heart of Doc Meyers husband.

name: Butch" Weldy
description: Hired by son of Old Rhodes; No money from Circuit Judge; Blind as Jack the Fiddler.

name: Knowlt Hoheimer
description: Stole dogs of Curl Trenary; Ran from Justice Arnett.

name: Lydia Puckett
description: Married to Knowlt Hoheimer; Cheated with Lucius Atherton.

name: Frank Drummer
description: No information available.

name: Hare Drummer
description: Children go to Aaron Haitfield and Sievers farm Conrad Siever.

name: Doc Hill (Dr. Alexander Hull)
description: Wife and son hate him; Saw Em Stanton.

name: Andy the Night-Watch
description: Saw Doc Hill.

name: Sarah Brown
description: Cheats on unknown huasband with Maurice.

name: Percy Bysshe Shelley
description: Father sent him to University; Roamed fields with Bert Kessler.

name: Flossie Cabanis
description: Brindle's opera house; Saw Ralph Barrett acting; Condemned by Thomas Rhodes; Argued against by Jefferson Howard.

name: Julia Miller
description: Has 65-year old husband.

name: Johnnie Sayre
description: Addresses Father unknown; Taken to house of widow Morris.

name: Charlie French
description: O'Brien boy snapped toy pistol; "Bucky" Estil fired cannon from Captain Harris.

name: Zenas Witt
description: Can't memorize like Frank Drummer; Saw Dr. Weese's ad.

name: Theodrore the Poet
description: No information available.

name: The Town Marshall
description: *Maybe include this an example of a prohibisionist was deacon Taylor so he could have voted him in*; Killed a Swede near Maple Grove; Struck Jack McGuire with cane and was killed by him.

name: Jack McGuire
description: Logan town Marshal hit him so he killed him; His Lawyer Kinsey Keene helped out old Thomas Rhodes; Judge was friend of Rhodes.

name: Dorcas Gustine
description: No information available.

name: Nicholas Bindle
description: Gave pipe organ to Deacon Rhodes.

name: Jacob Goodpasture
description: Son died at Fort Sumter.

name: Harold Arnett
description: Heard coughing of John Yarnell; Has wife unknown.

name: Margaret Fuller Slack
description: Photograph from Penniwit; Wooed by John Slack the druggist.

name: George Trimble
description: Taxed by Henry George; Has wife unknown who made him join the church; Interripted in session by Willie Metcalf.

name: Dr. Siegfried Iseman
description: Incarcerated by Federal Judge for fraud.

name: Ace" Shaw
description: No information available.

name: Lois Spears
description: Born Lois Fluke of Willard Fluke; Wife of Cyrus Spears; Mother of Myrtle and Virgil Spears.

name: Justice Arnett
description: Docket shaken loose by Butch Weldy burning explosion.

name: Willard Fluke
description: Wife is Lois Spears; Cheated with "Cleopatra.

name: Aner Clute
description: Promise of Marriage from Lucius Atherton.

name: Lucius Atherton
description: Lived at Mayer's restaurant; Someone sings of Beatrice.

name: Homer Clapp
description: Aner Clute refused him kiss; Usurped by Lucius Atherton.

name: Deacon Taylor
description: Stole alcohol from Trainor the Druggist.
